Class AuthService

java.lang.Object
Service.AuthService
public class AuthService extends Object
AuthService handles user authentication and account-related operations such as login validation and password changes.

  • Method Details

    • isValidNRIC

      public boolean isValidNRIC(String nric)
      Validates the format of a Singapore NRIC number.
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC string to validate
      Returns:
      true if the NRIC format is valid, false otherwise

    • findByNric

      public User findByNric(String nric)
      Finds and retrieves a user by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC of the user to find
      Returns:
      the User object if found, or null if not found

    • authenticate

      public User authenticate(String nric, String password) throws AuthenticationException
      Authenticates a user using their NRIC and password.
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC of the user
      password - the user's password
      Returns:
      the authenticated User object
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - if authentication fails due to incorrect credentials

    • checkUser

      public boolean checkUser(String nric, String password)
      Checks if a user exists with the given NRIC and password.
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC of the user
      password - the user's password
      Returns:
      true if the user exists and the password matches, false otherwise

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(User user, String newPassword)
      Changes the password for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose password is to be changed
      newPassword - the new password to set
